long_description: An all-in-one wallet and weather-resistant handlebar mount, the Timbuk2 Skyline iPhone Mount protects your phone while letting you easily and securely mount it to your bike's handlebar. Clear TPU case envelops a Timbuk2 Mission Wallet for full iPhone5 touchscreen functionality and secure, separate slots for your ID and credit cards. Clear TPU face for full-access to phone screen while in the case. Includes bicycle handlebar mount. Secure metal snap handlebar mount attachment on the Timbuk2 Skyline iPhone Mount is easy to attach and detach.
short_description: An all-in-one wallet and weather-resistant handlebar mount, the Timbuk2 Skyline iPhone Mount protects your phone while letting you easily and securely mount it to your bike's handlebar.
